ygData.subject: Re: Pissed off pottery buffs? I seem to be unaffected
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Anyone know if they are adjusting pie tin prices to match?  I mean, nerfing the sketch price so you can t make a profit selling to merchants is one thing,
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 26 Jul 1999 07:42:55 -0400, Chris Holko wrote:

>The new prices are on TEST SERVER ONLY.
>
>They come to a server near you on Tuesday. So up until TUESDAY you can
>make pie tins at the normal profit rate.

Anyone know if they are adjusting pie tin prices to match? I mean, nerfing
the sketch price so you can't make a profit selling to merchants is one thing,
but nerfing the price so you can't sell to players is just stupid. If the
intent is to provide incentive to sell to players, keeping the merchant price
of pie tins at around 7g (to buy) and raising our price to create them above a
plat is just mean.

Cedrick
